text:
Parkour | Software Engineer, Mobile Developer | Budapest (Hungary) | Onsite, VISA

----------------------

We're building drive-thru payments, turning your car into a payment token - to park, fuel, and even buy fast food without stopping to pay. Join our engineering team and help pioneer new ways to make personal mobility better up against exciting challenges.

Engineering stands on 3 legs:

* Payment handling via visual identity

* Parking (1st of 7 focus areas) product

* Consumer mobile app

About us in a nutshell:

* Golang, Python (Django), Java, C++, React Native

* VC backed. Pre-money.

---

Drop your message to:

jobs@getparkour.com

More info:

https://dreamjo.bs/en/job/parkour/software-engineer

https://dreamjo.bs/en/job/parkour/mobile-app-developer
